entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Fort Erie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:59 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries near noon. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow or ice pellets. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Ice pellets or freezing rain beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Windy. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 3.
